hackathon-description-text: We're so excited to announce that registration is open for our sixth Photo Hack Day, this time back in our hometown of NYC! Adobe aims to enable developer creativity, and participants of PHDNYC will have the opportunity to get a hands on look at the Adobe Creative SDK and create amazing hacks with Sponsor APIs. We’re making this a more intimate event, focused on our terrific community of developers and users.
hackathon-rules:
Some of the categories are judged by third party sponsors who have donated prizes for their category. Employees of these third party sponsors 
 to participate in the Contest and are eligible to win certain prizes, but may not win for the category its employer is judging.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The best hack that deals with Photo Creation and/or Visualization will win 4 Moment Lenses
The best hack that solves a problem with Photo Organization, Curration and/or Discovery will win 2 Narrative Clips
Moment Camera for iPhone + an Amazon gift card
GoPro Hero4: Silver + Parrot AR Drone
6 months free trial: up to 5TB storage, 2TB bandwidth monthly PLUS unlimited photo / video uploads, transforms and API calls
An awesome remote controlled, flying shark
One year free of the GROW plan (a $1,200 value)
Two Tessel Microcontrollers with Camera Modules
One year free of an Adobe Creative Cloud subscription
6 months free of our Pro plan

hackathon-description-header: Photo Hack Day, an exciting, weekend-long coding marathon, brings together talented developers and designers to build amazing applications using web and mobile photo API's.
